results.name: Triangle read by rows, A054525 * A130123, 1<=k<=n.
comment: Row sums = A000740 starting with offset 1: (1, 1, 3, 6, 15, 27, 63,...).
formula: Mobius transform of A130123, where A130123 = an infinite lower triangular matrix with (1, 2, 4, 8,...) in the main diagonal and the rest zeros.
